name: Test the swab & rinse sample limit of equipment map to production
description: This test case test the swab & rinse sample limit of equipment map with production for formulation when all (toxicity, dosage, default) criteria is selected & for active facility when all (toxicity, dosage, default, LD50) and swab & rinse sample unit is in ppmand Upper cap setting for sample limit is On
descriptionHtml: This test case test the swab & rinse sample limit of equipment map with production for formulation when all (toxicity, dosage, default) criteria is selected & for active facility when all (toxicity, dosage, default, LD50) and swab & rinse sample unit is in ppmand Upper cap setting for sample limit is On
